missing_bjt_model: Add a model definition like `.model QMOD NPN(BF=100 VAF=100)` before using the transistor.
resistor_ground_issue: Ensure resistors are connected between valid nodes, not just 0. Example: R1 N001 0 1k
voltage_source_without_value: Voltage sources must have a value. Example: V1 N001 0 DC 5
floating_node: Detected a floating node. Ensure all nodes are connected to at least two components.
missing_include: If you are using special components (like opamps), include the library file with `.include <filename>.lib`.
